info.author: Michael Kluge
info.description: reads or fragments per gene, exon or any other feature are counted using featureCounts
info.paperDescription: FeatureCounts (%SOFTWARE_VERSION%) was applied to count read/fragment counts per gene/exon/other feature according to %annotationÂ§N% annotation [Liao Y, Smyth GK and Shi W. featureCounts: an efficient general-purpose program for assigning sequence reads to genomic features. Bioinformatics, 30(7):923-30, 2014].

param.name: annotation
param.description: feature annotation in GTF or SAF format

param.name: input
param.description: indexed BAM file which should be used for counting

param.name: output
param.description: path to output file

param.name: annotationType
param.description: disables automatic type detection based on the file ending of the input file; valid values: GTF or SAF;

param.name: featureType
param.description: feature type (e.g. exon or intron) which is used for counting in GTF mode

param.name: groupType
param.description: attribute which is used for summarization in GTF mode

param.name: stranded
param.description: indicates strand-specific read counting; possible values: 0 (unstranded), 1 (stranded) and 2 (reversely stranded)

param.name: threads
param.description: number of threads used for counting

param.name: disableGroupSummarization
param.description: flag that can be used to turn summarization on groupType off

param.name: multiMapping
param.description: flag that enables counting of multi mapped reads

param.name: primary
param.description: when enabled only alignments which are flagged as primary alignments are counted

param.name: countFragments
param.description: counts fragments instead of reads; only for paired end data

param.name: multiCountMetaFeatures
param.description: allows a read to be counted for more than one meta-feature

param.name: detailedReadAssignments
param.description: saves for each read if it was assigned or not; filename: {input_file_name}.featureCounts; format: read name<TAB>status<TAB>feature name<TAB>number of counts for that read

param.name: minOverlap
param.description: minimum number of overlapping bases required to assign a read to a feature; also negative values are allowed

param.name: minReadOverlap
param.description: minimum number of overlapping bases required to assign a read to a feature; also negative values are allowed

param.name: minFracOverlap
param.description: assign reads to the meta-feature/feature which has the largest number of overlapping bases

param.name: readExtension5
param.description: extend reads at the 5' end

param.name: readExtension3
param.description: extend reads at the 3' end

param.name: fraction
param.description: count fractional; only in combination with the --assignToAllOverlappingFeatures or/and --multiMapping flag(s)

param.name: largestOverlap
param.description: assign reads to the meta-feature/feature that has the largest number of overlapping bases.

param.name: longReads
param.description: mode for long read counting (e.g. Nanopore or PacBio)

var.name: FeatureCountSummaryFile
var.description: absolute file path to the summary file

var.name: FeatureCountCountFile
var.description: absolute file path to the count file
